text.lezah.spectator_mode2: Your game time is over, you can spectate and do tp!
text.lezah.downgrade: Because an outdated version of LezaH Datapack was put in, it is downgrading the datapack RIGHT NOW. The creator of the datapack is not responsible for what happens.
text.lezah.papermc.compatibility: Your server is not compatible with LezaH Datapack, your server is using PaperMC, you need to switch to Vanilla or other server software.
text.lezah.papermc.load: The datapack was not fully loaded.
